articles.author: Sarah Rumpf
articles.title: CDC warns of Marburg virus after deadly Africa outbreak - Fox News
articles.description: The Center of Disease Control is warning travelers to Guinea and Tanzania of an outbreak of the deadly Marburg virus which officials say has epidemic potential.
articles.content: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is urging travelers to Guinea and Tanzania to be mindful of contracting the deadly Marburg virus. The CDC is also sending personnel to Africa… [+2129 chars]
